The Original Family: Divine-Blooded Progenitors

üåü Created by the Primordials

The Original Family were not born of mortal parents, but were crafted in a grand experiment by the Primordials themselves. Each sibling was imbued with a seed of godhood, representing fundamental aspects of existence that would later define the supernatural species they would create.

They were neither fully divine nor entirely mortal, existing as bridges between the cosmic forces of the Primordials and the emerging world of physical existence.

üß¨ The Grand Experiment

The Primordials shaped each member of the Original Family with specific traits and purposes:

  • Divine Essence: Each carried a fragment of Primordial power
  • Genetic Templates: Their bloodlines would seed new species
  • Cosmic Purpose: To be stewards of the mortal realm
  • Evolutionary Catalysts: To guide the development of supernatural abilities

‚ö° Powers and Abilities

As divine-blooded beings, the Original Family possessed abilities that far exceeded any of their descendants:

  • Immortality: Ageless and nearly indestructible
  • Shapeshifting: Could alter their forms at will
  • Magic Mastery: Command over multiple magical disciplines
  • Reality Influence: Could alter the fundamental nature of things
  • Dimensional Travel: Movement between realms and times

üé≠ The Hidden Truth

While legends speak of noble progenitors, the truth is more complex. Some members of the Original Family were benevolent creators, while others were driven by darker impulses. This duality would be reflected in the species they created - explaining why vampires, werewolves, and other supernatural beings can be either forces of good or evil.

The Eight Siblings

ü©∏ The Sibling of Blood

Domain: Life Force, Vitality, Consumption

Legacy: Vampires - creatures of blood and eternal hunger

Traits: Commanded blood magic, could grant immortality through consumption, created the first bloodline hierarchies

üåô The Sibling of Change

Domain: Transformation, Cycles, Natural Order

Legacy: Werewolves - beings tied to lunar cycles and transformation

Traits: Master of shapeshifting, connected to natural forces, established pack hierarchies

‚ú® The Sibling of Light

Domain: Illumination, Truth, Beauty

Legacy: Faeries - beings of light and ethereal beauty

Traits: Radiated divine light, could bend reality through beauty, created glamours and illusions

üß† The Sibling of Memory

Domain: Knowledge, History, Magic Structure

Legacy: Sorcerers - humans with structured magical abilities

Traits: Perfect recall, could implant knowledge, created the magical discipline system

üíÄ The Sibling of Death

Domain: Endings, Necromancy, Undeath

Legacy: Skeletons and Undead - beings who defy natural death

Traits: Command over death magic, could animate the dead, bridged life and death

üçΩÔ∏è The Sibling of Hunger

Domain: Consumption, Growth, Desire

Legacy: Demons and Parasitic Entities

Traits: Insatiable appetites, could consume emotions and souls, created possessing entities

ü¶¥ The Sibling of Decay

Domain: Corruption, Disease, Breakdown

Legacy: Plague-bearers, Viral Entities

Traits: Spread corruption and disease, could create viral magic, master of biological warfare

üå™Ô∏è The Sibling of Chaos

Domain: Disorder, Unpredictability, Raw Magic

Legacy: Wild Magic Users, Remnants

Traits: Unpredictable powers, could disrupt magical order, created chaotic entities

Species Legacy

üß¨ The Bloodline Inheritance

Each member of the Original Family did not simply create their species - they became the genetic template. Their divine essence was encoded into the very DNA of their children, creating bloodlines that would carry forward their traits and abilities for millennia.

üå≥ The Species Tree

Vampire Bloodlines

Originating from the Sibling of Blood, vampire bloodlines maintain strict hierarchies based on proximity to the original source. The closer to the Original, the more powerful the vampire.

  • The Original Vampire (The Sibling of Blood himself)
  • First Generation - Direct children
  • Ancient Bloodlines - Grandchildren and great-grandchildren
  • Noble Houses - Established vampire families
  • Common Vampires - Later generations

Werewolf Packs

The Sibling of Change created the first werewolf pack, establishing the alpha-beta-omega structure that would define werewolf society. Each pack can trace its lineage back to one of the original children.

  • The First Alpha (The Sibling of Change)
  • Original Packs - Each led by a direct child
  • Ancient Territories - Regional pack clusters
  • Modern Packs - Contemporary werewolf groups

Magical Bloodlines

The Sibling of Memory didn't create sorcerers directly, but instead awakened the magical potential in humans and gave them the structured disciplines to safely channel power.

  • The First Sorcerer (Taught by the Sibling of Memory)
  • Elemental Masters - Fire, Air, Earth, Water
  • Adept Originators - Creators of specialized magics
  • Modern Sorcerers - Contemporary magic users

üîÑ Bloodline Dilution and Strengthening

Over millennia, the divine essence in bloodlines has both diluted and, paradoxically, sometimes strengthened through specific circumstances:

  • Natural Dilution: Each generation becomes further removed from the original divine source
  • Interbreeding: When different supernatural bloodlines mix, unpredictable results occur
  • Awakening Events: Traumatic or mystical experiences can strengthen dormant bloodlines
  • Ritual Enhancement: Certain magical rituals can concentrate bloodline power
  • Divine Intervention: Rare instances where Primordials directly influence a bloodline

Historical Lives and Disguises

üé≠ Walking Among Mortals

The Original Family did not simply vanish after creating their species. Many lived among mortals for centuries, taking on false identities and influencing human history from the shadows. Some became heroes, others became the monsters of legend.

üó°Ô∏è Jack the Ripper (1864 London)

True Identity: The Sibling of Decay

Purpose: Testing viral transmutation abilities

One of the darkest chapters in the family's history. The Sibling of Decay, infected with an evolved strain of the Ripper Virus, stalked London's streets, feeding on guilt and shame while perfecting biological warfare techniques.

Read Full Account ‚Üí

‚öîÔ∏è Arthur Pendragon (Human Ally)

True Identity: Heir to a Blessed Bloodline

Purpose: Fulfilling ancestral blessing through noble kingship

Centuries before Arthur's birth, an ancestor of the Pendragon line showed kindness to the Sibling of Change in his time of need. Grateful, the Sibling of Change blessed the entire bloodline. This ancient blessing made Arthur inherently worthy of wielding Excalibur and earning the friendship of the Original Family.

üìö Merlin the Magician

True Identity: The Sibling of Memory

Purpose: Teaching structured magic to mortals

The greatest wizard of legend was the Sibling of Memory in disguise, establishing the foundation for all modern magical education and discipline structures.

üèõÔ∏è Alexander the Great

True Identity: The Sibling of Change

Purpose: Spreading supernatural bloodlines across continents

The conqueror's rapid expansion wasn't just military - it was a calculated effort to spread werewolf and shapeshifter bloodlines across the known world.

Read Full Account ‚Üí

üíÄ The Black Death's Origin

True Identity: The Sibling of Decay (again)

Purpose: Population control experiment

The devastating pandemic was not natural but a magical experiment gone wrong, as the Sibling of Decay tested the limits of biological manipulation.

üé® Leonardo da Vinci

True Identity: The Sibling of Memory

Purpose: Advancing human knowledge and art

The Renaissance master was the Sibling of Memory once again, using his perfect recall and divine insight to push human achievement to new heights. Among his most treasured works was a portrait painted as a favor for his immortal friend Vlad - the dying wish of Vlad's beloved Lysandra, forever immortalized as the Mona Lisa.

Read Full Account ‚Üí

ü©∏ Vlad Tepes "Dracula" (1431-1476)

True Identity: Vlad - The Original Vampire

Purpose: Testing mortal fear and establishing vampire legends

The Original Vampire chose to live as Vlad III of Wallachia, earning the name "Tepes" (The Impaler) and later "Dracula" (Son of the Dragon). He deliberately cultivated his terrifying reputation to study how mortals react to legendary figures. During his final battle with Mehmet II, who sought the glory of killing an Original, Vlad rescued 10,000 boys. One of these boys would later become the legendary vampire hunter known as Alucard, forever bound to his savior's story.

ÔøΩ The Silent Observer of Humanity

For millennia before his public persona as Vlad Tepes, the Original Vampire quietly documented human societal evolution. He witnessed and influenced countless pivotal moments: the destruction of Pompeii, the Fall of Rome, both World Wars, the Boston Tea Party, and even 9/11. His greatest contribution to human advancement was inspiring the concept of the electric light bulb - Thomas Edison was merely the medium who brought Vlad's idea to fruition, aided by electrokinetic secrets Vlad shared with him.

üíî Lysandra and the Mona Lisa

Throughout his immortal existence, Vlad found love with Lysandra (sometimes called Lisandra), a mortal woman who knew and accepted his true vampiric nature. When she lay dying, her final wish was to be immortalized by their mutual friend, Leonardo da Vinci (the Sibling of Memory in disguise). The resulting portrait became one of Leonardo's most treasured works - the Mona Lisa, with "Lisa" being short for Lysandra. Her enigmatic smile captures both the love she felt for Vlad and the secrets she kept about the supernatural world.

ÔøΩüó°Ô∏è The Battle with Mehmet

When Sultan Mehmet II discovered Vlad's true vampiric nature, he saw an opportunity for unprecedented glory and riches. The historical accounts of their conflict were true, but the real battle was between a mortal emperor and an immortal Original. Vlad's victory saved thousands and created one of history's most enduring legends.

‚öîÔ∏è The Birth of Alucard

Among the rescued boys was a young warrior who witnessed Vlad's true power. This boy, forever changed by the experience, dedicated his life to understanding and hunting the vampires that came after his savior. He took the name Alucard - Dracula spelled backwards - as both tribute and warning to the vampire world.

üï∞Ô∏è Pattern of Influence

Analysis of historical records reveals a pattern in the Original Family's interventions:

  • Crisis Points: They often appeared during pivotal moments in human history
  • Species Development: Their actions influenced the evolution of their created species
  • Balance Maintenance: They worked to prevent any one supernatural group from dominating
  • Knowledge Transfer: They gradually introduced magical concepts to human civilization

Creation of Magical Disciplines

üî• The Chaos Problem

In the early days after species creation, magic was wild and uncontrolled. Sorcerers regularly died from magical feedback, spells would spiral out of control, and reality itself became unstable around concentrations of magic users. The world was on the brink of magical apocalypse.

‚öñÔ∏è The Solution: Structured Disciplines

To restore balance, the Original Family collaborated to create the Magical Disciplines - structured paths that would channel raw magic into stable, learnable forms. Each discipline was designed with built-in limitations to prevent catastrophic magical events.

üåä Elemental Magic

Creator: The Sibling of Memory

Purpose: Foundation-level magic for beginners

The four classical elements (Fire, Air, Earth, Water) were chosen because they represent fundamental forces that humans could intuitively understand and safely practice.

‚ú® Adept Disciplines

Creator: Various siblings collaborating

Purpose: Specialized magic for advanced practitioners

Each Adept discipline was designed around a specific concept or skill, allowing sorcerers to develop expertise while maintaining safety through specialization.

üíÄ Necromancy

Creator: The Sibling of Death

Purpose: Understanding and commanding death magic

The most dangerous discipline, necromancy was heavily restricted and designed with numerous safeguards to prevent necromancers from losing their humanity.

üìú Sigil Magic

Creator: The Sibling of Memory

Purpose: Storing and controlling magical energy

Sigils provided a way to safely store magical energy and create lasting magical effects without requiring constant concentration from the caster.

üîí The Discipline Limits

Each magical discipline was intentionally designed with limitations:

  • Single Discipline Rule: Most sorcerers can only master one discipline deeply
  • Energy Conservation: Magic requires personal energy, preventing unlimited casting
  • Emotional Stability: Strong emotions can disrupt magical control
  • Physical Gestures: Most magic requires movement, making stealth casting difficult
  • Verbal Components: Speaking focuses magical intent but can be overheard

üåü Legacy of Structure

The discipline system created by the Original Family became the foundation for all modern magical education. Sanctuaries, magical schools, and training programs all follow the basic principles established in those early days. Without this structure, the magical world would have destroyed itself long ago.

Unsolved Mysteries

üîÆ What Happened to the Siblings?

While historical records show the Original Family taking various identities throughout human history, their current status remains one of the greatest mysteries in the supernatural world. Some theories include:

‚ú® Transcendence Theory

They evolved beyond physical existence and now exist as pure consciousness, occasionally influencing events from beyond the material plane.

üò¥ The Great Sleep

They entered a state of divine hibernation, waiting for a specific cosmic event or crisis that will require their awakening.

üé≠ Still Among Us

They continue to live as mortals, their true identities hidden even from themselves through magical memory blocks.

üîí Imprisoned

They were bound or banished by the Primordials as punishment for some unknown transgression.

üåç Merged with Reality

They became one with the fundamental forces of the world, their consciousness distributed throughout all supernatural phenomena.

‚è≥ The Waiting Game

They're preparing for the return of the Primordials or some other cosmic threat, gathering power and positioning their descendants for a final battle.

üóùÔ∏è The Lost Artifacts

Several powerful artifacts created by the Original Family have been lost to time:

  • The Crown of First Light: Created by the Sibling of Light, grants command over all illumination
  • The Blood Chalice: The Sibling of Blood's creation, can grant or remove vampire status
  • The Memory Codex: Contains all knowledge gathered by the Sibling of Memory
  • The Change Stone: Allows perfect control over shapeshifting abilities
  • The Death Mask: Grants power over life and death itself
  • The Decay Vial: Contains the pure essence of corruption and disease
  • The Hunger Bell: Can summon or banish all demonic entities
  • The Chaos Sphere: Holds the power to unmake magical order itself

üìú The Prophecy of Return

Ancient texts speak of a prophecy regarding the Original Family's return:

"When the bloodlines run thin and the disciplines break,
When chaos once more does the foundations shake,
The Eight shall return to set the world right,
Or end all existence in eternal night."

This prophecy has sparked countless debates among scholars about whether the Original Family's return would be salvation or apocalypse.

üåü Modern Implications

The mystery of the Original Family's fate has profound implications for the modern supernatural world:

  • Bloodline Politics: Vampire and werewolf hierarchies are based on proximity to the Originals
  • Magical Research: Sorcerers seek to understand and improve upon the original disciplines
  • Artifact Hunting: Treasure hunters and scholars search for lost Original artifacts
  • Prophecy Watchers: Secret societies monitor for signs of the prophesied return
  • Identity Seekers: Some believe they are descendants or reincarnations of the Originals
